channel.title: [pi] npc following?
channel.description:
trying to add npc following and im getting this compiler error [code=Java] if (npcs[i].followingPlayer && (npcs[i].followPlayer > 0)) { followPlayer(i, c.playerId); } [/code]
thats my code and heres my error [code] src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1521: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler followPlayer(i, c.player Id); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [pi] npc following?
